title: ATC decreasing thru market shows natural monopoly

content.description: TheÂ question refers to the following diagram of a natural monopolist.
content.question: The firm shown in the diagram qualifies as a natural monopoly because

choices.label: the demand curve is downward sloping
the demand curve lies above the marginal revenue curve
the average total cost is decreasing in the relevant range of market demand
the firm can maximize profit with any output level it chooses
marginal revenue is positive at the profit-maximizing output level

content.answer: the average total cost is decreasing in the relevant range of market demand
